description: Stay cool and protected with the Rab Men's Force Tee—a lightweight, breathable performance shirt designed for hiking, climbing, and high-output activities. Featuring UPF protection to shield against harmful UV rays and Motiv™ fabric for moisture-wicking comfort, this slim-fit tee works great as a standalone layer in the heat or as a base layer in cooler conditions. Stylish and functional, it’s ready for both trail adventures and casual wear. #running #hiking #outdoorgear
